title: (x) Building Up In Love - Black Chancery {Mark S}
content:
OK, yes it’s ugly, but aside from that, what is the name of this script font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [buildinguplove.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052327/http:/typophile.com/files/buildinguplove.jpg) | 30.65 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: Ugly is right. I’d know that face anywhere: [Black Chancery](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052327/http:/www.masterstech-home.com/The_Library/Font_Samples/Font_Indices/Image_Pages/B/BlackChancery.html). My condolences if you need to use it.
